name: Video Downloader
description: Download Video from:  Facebook  Instagram  Features:  One-Click download.  No login required for public video.  List all downloaded videos.  Play video inside App.  Share video with other Apps like WhatsApp.  Delete video with option to remove from device.  How to use? 1- In Facebook App: Copy the post link using Copy Link option. 2- In Instagram App: Copy the post link using Copy Share Link option. 3- This application will notify you to download the video immediately    Typical Use Cases:  You liked a video in Facebook or Instagram and want to share it with friends.  You want to save a video before it being deleted from facebook or instagram.  You want to watch video multiple times but your internet data is limited.   Notes:   Private video requires login. Youll be notified to login if required.  This App can work with web version Facebook in browser but youve to open the post itself and copy its link from browser address bar.  Unfortunately, this App is not working with Facebook Lite as there is no way to copy post link.    Facebook, video downloader  Instagram, video downloader  Enjoy
